name: bbn\Db\Internal\Engine

postCreation.name: postCreation
postCreation.summary: Actions to do once the PDO object has been created

doc.description:
Actions to do once the PDO object has been created

```php
X::hdump($ctrl->db->postCreation()); // null
```

postCreation.comments:
/**
   * Actions to do once the PDO object has been created
   *
   * ```php
   * X::hdump($ctrl->db->postCreation()); // null 
   * ```
   * 
   * @return void
   */

change.name: change
change.summary: Changes the database used to the given one.
change.comments:
/**
   * Changes the database used to the given one.
   *
   * ```php
   * $db = new Db();
   * X::dump($db->change('db_example'));
   * // (db)
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $db The database's name
   * @return self
   */

escape.name: escape
escape.summary: Escapes names with the appropriate quotes (db, tables, columns, keys...)
escape.comments:
/**
   * Escapes names with the appropriate quotes (db, tables, columns, keys...)
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->escape("table_users"));
   * // (string) `table_users`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $item The name to escape.
   * @return string
   */

tableFullName.name: tableFullName

arguments.name: escaped
arguments.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped.

params.name: $escaped
params.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped.

tableFullName.comments:
/**
   * Return table's full name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->tableFullName("table_users"));
   * // (String) db_example.table_users
   * X::dump($db->tableFullName("table_users", true));
   * // (String) `db_example`.`table_users`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table   The table's name (escaped or not).
   * @param bool   $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped.
   * @return string | false
   */

isTableFullName.name: isTableFullName
isTableFullName.summary: Returns true if the given string is the full name of a table ('database.table').

doc.description:
Returns true if the given string is the full name of a table ('database.table').

```php
X::hdump($ctrl->db->isTableFullName("table_users")); // true or false
```

isTableFullName.comments:
/**
   * Returns true if the given string is the full name of a table ('database.table').
   *
   * ```php
   * X::hdump($ctrl->db->isTableFullName("table_users")); // true or false
   * ```
   * 
   * @param string $table The table's name
   * @return bool
   */

isColFullName.name: isColFullName
isColFullName.summary: Returns true if the given string is the full name of a column ('table.column').

doc.description:
Returns true if the given string is the full name of a column ('table.column').

```php
X::hdump($ctrl->db->isColFullName("column_users")); // true or false
```

isColFullName.comments:
/**
   * Returns true if the given string is the full name of a column ('table.column').
   *
   * ```php
   * X::hdump($ctrl->db->isColFullName("column_users")); // true or false
   * ```
   * 
   * @param string $col
   * @return bool
   */

tableSimpleName.name: tableSimpleName

arguments.name: escaped
arguments.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped

params.name: $escaped
params.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped

tableSimpleName.comments:
/**
   * Return table's simple name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->tableSimpleName("example_db.table_users"));
   * // (string) table_users
   * X::dump($db->tableSimpleName("example.table_users", true));
   * // (string) `table_users`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table   The table's name (escaped or not)
   * @param bool   $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped
   * @return string | false
   */

colFullName.name: colFullName

arguments.name: escaped
arguments.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped

params.name: $escaped
params.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped

colFullName.comments:
/**
   * Return column's full name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->colFullName("name", "table_users"));
   * // (string)  table_users.name Hello Ohohoho!!
   * X::dump($db->colFullName("name", "table_users", true));
   * // (string) \`table_users\`.\`name\`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $col The column's name (escaped or not)
   * @param string|null $table The table's name (escaped or not)
   * @param bool $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped
   * @return string | false
   */

colSimpleName.name: colSimpleName

arguments.name: col
arguments.description: The column's complete name (escaped or not).

arguments.name: escaped
arguments.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped.

params.name: $col
params.description: The column's complete name (escaped or not).

params.name: $escaped
params.description: If set to true the returned string will be escaped.

colSimpleName.comments:
/**
   * Return the column's simple name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->colSimpleName("table_users.name"));
   * // (string) name
   * X::dump($db->colSimpleName("table_users.name", true));
   * // (string) `name`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $col     The column's complete name (escaped or not).
   * @param bool   $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped.
   * @return string | false
   */

disableKeys.name: disableKeys
disableKeys.comments:
/**
   * Disables foreign keys constraints.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->disableKeys());
   * // (self)
   * ```
   *
   * @return self
   */

enableKeys.name: enableKeys
enableKeys.comments:
/**
   * Enables foreign keys constraints.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->enableKeys());
   * // (db)
   * ```
   *
   * @return self
   */

getDatabases.name: getDatabases
getDatabases.summary: Return databases' names as an array.

doc.description:
Return databases' names as an array.

```php
X::dump($db->getDatabases());
/*
(array)[
     "db_customers",
     "db_clients",
     "db_empty",
     "db_example",
     "db_mail"
     ]
```

getDatabases.comments:
/**
   * Return databases' names as an array.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getDatabases());
   * /*
   * (array)[
   *      "db_customers",
   *      "db_clients",
   *      "db_empty",
   *      "db_example",
   *      "db_mail"
   *      ]
   * ```
   * @return null|array
   */

getTables.name: getTables
getTables.summary: Return tables' names of a database as an array.

doc.description:
Return tables' names of a database as an array.

```php
X::dump($db->getTables('db_example'));
/*
(array) [
       "clients",
       "columns",
       "cron",
       "journal",
       "dbs",
       "examples",
       "history",
       "hosts",
       "keys",
       "mails",
       "medias",
       "notes",
       "medias",
       "versions"
       ]
```

getTables.comments:
/**
   * Return tables' names of a database as an array.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getTables('db_example'));
   * /*
   * (array) [
   *        "clients",
   *        "columns",
   *        "cron",
   *        "journal",
   *        "dbs",
   *        "examples",
   *        "history",
   *        "hosts",
   *        "keys",
   *        "mails",
   *        "medias",
   *        "notes",
   *        "medias",
   *        "versions"
   *        ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $database Database name
   * @return null|array
   */

description.description:
Return columns' structure of a table as an array indexed with the fields names.

* ```php
X::dump($db->getColumns('table_users'));
/* (array)[
           "id" => [
             "position" => 1,
             "null" => 0,
             "key" => "PRI",
             "default" => null,
             "extra" => "auto_increment",
             "signed" => 0,
             "maxlength" => "8",
             "type" => "int",

doc.example_method:
* ```php
X::dump($db->getColumns('table_users'));
/* (array)[
           "id" => [
             "position" => 1,
             "null" => 0,
             "key" => "PRI",
             "default" => null,
             "extra" => "auto_increment",
             "signed" => 0,
             "maxlength" => "8",
             "type" => "int",
           ],
          "name" => [
             "position" => 2,
             "null" => 0,
             "key" => null,
             "default" => null,
             "extra" => "",
             "signed" => 0,
             "maxlength" => "30",
             "type" => "varchar",
           ],
           "surname" => [
             "position" => 3,
             "null" => 0,
             "key" => null,

             "extra" => "",

```

getColumns.comments:
/**
   * Return columns' structure of a table as an array indexed with the fields names.
   *
   * * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getColumns('table_users'));
   * /* (array)[
   *            "id" => [
   *              "position" => 1,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => "PRI",
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "auto_increment",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "8",
   *              "type" => "int",
   *            ],
   *           "name" => [
   *              "position" => 2,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => null,
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "30",
   *              "type" => "varchar",
   *            ],
   *            "surname" => [
   *              "position" => 3,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => null,
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "30",
   *              "type" => "varchar",
   *            ],
   *            "address" => [
   *              "position" => 4,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => "UNI",
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "30",
   *              "type" => "varchar",
   *            ],
   *          ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table The table's name
   * @return null|array
   */

getKeys.name: getKeys
getKeys.summary: Return the table's keys as an array indexed with the fields names.
getKeys.comments:
/**
   * Return the table's keys as an array indexed with the fields names.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getKeys("table_users"));
   * /*
   * (array)[
   *      "keys" => [
   *        "PRIMARY" => [
   *          "columns" => [
   *            "id",
   *          ],
   *          "ref_db" => null,
   *          "ref_table" => null,
   *          "ref_column" => null,
   *          "unique" => 1,
   *        ],
   *        "number" => [
   *          "columns" => [
   *            "number",
   *          ],
   *          "ref_db" => null,
   *          "ref_table" => null,
   *          "ref_column" => null,
   *         "unique" => 1,
   *        ],
   *      ],
   *      "cols" => [
   *        "id" => [
   *          "PRIMARY",
   *        ],
   *        "number" => [
   *          "number",
   *        ],
   *      ],
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table The table's name
   * @return null|array
   */

getConditions.name: getConditions
getConditions.summary: Returns a string with the conditions for any filter clause.

doc.description: Returns a string with the conditions for any filter clause.

getConditions.comments:
/**
   * Returns a string with the conditions for any filter clause.
   *
   * @param array $conditions
   * @param array $cfg
   * @param bool $is_having
   * @param int $indent
   * @return string
   */

getSelect.name: getSelect
getSelect.summary: Return SQL code for row(s) SELECT.

doc.description:
Return SQL code for row(s) SELECT.

```php
X::dump($db->getSelect(['tables' => ['users'],'fields' => ['id', 'name']]));
/*
(string)
  SELECT
   `table_users`.`name`,
   `table_users`.`surname`
```

getSelect.comments:
/**
   * Return SQL code for row(s) SELECT.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getSelect(['tables' => ['users'],'fields' => ['id', 'name']]));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *   SELECT
   *    `table_users`.`name`,
   *    `table_users`.`surname`
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getInsert.name: getInsert
getInsert.summary: Returns the SQL code for an INSERT statement.

doc.description:
Returns the SQL code for an INSERT statement.

```php
X::dump($db->getInsert([
  'tables' => ['table_users'],
  'fields' => ['name','surname']
]));
/*
(string)
 INSERT INTO `db_example`.`table_users` (
             `name`, `surname`)
             VALUES (?, ?)
```

getInsert.comments:
/**
   * Returns the SQL code for an INSERT statement.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getInsert([
   *   'tables' => ['table_users'],
   *   'fields' => ['name','surname']
   * ]));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *  INSERT INTO `db_example`.`table_users` (
   *              `name`, `surname`)
   *              VALUES (?, ?)
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getUpdate.name: getUpdate
getUpdate.summary: Returns the SQL code for an UPDATE statement.

doc.description:
Returns the SQL code for an UPDATE statement.

```php
X::dump($db->getUpdate([
  'tables' => ['table_users'],
  'fields' => ['name','surname']
]));
/*
(string)
   UPDATE `db_example`.`table_users`
   SET `table_users`.`name` = ?,
       `table_users`.`surname` = ?
```

getUpdate.comments:
/**
   * Returns the SQL code for an UPDATE statement.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getUpdate([
   *   'tables' => ['table_users'],
   *   'fields' => ['name','surname']
   * ]));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *    UPDATE `db_example`.`table_users`
   *    SET `table_users`.`name` = ?,
   *        `table_users`.`surname` = ?
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getDelete.name: getDelete
getDelete.summary: Returns the SQL code for a DELETE statement.
getDelete.comments:
/**
   * Returns the SQL code for a DELETE statement.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getDelete(['tables' => ['table_users']]));
   * // (string) DELETE FROM `db_example`.`table_users` * WHERE 1 AND `table_users`.`id` = ?
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getJoin.name: getJoin
getJoin.summary: Returns a string with the JOIN part of the query if there is, empty otherwise

doc.description: Returns a string with the JOIN part of the query if there is, empty otherwise

getJoin.comments:
/**
   * Returns a string with the JOIN part of the query if there is, empty otherwise
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getWhere.name: getWhere
getWhere.comments:
/**
   * Return a string with 'where' conditions.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getWhere(['id' => 9], 'table_users'));
   * // (string) WHERE 1 AND `table_users`.`id` = ?
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getGroupBy.comments:
/**
   * Returns a string with the GROUP BY part of the query if there is, empty otherwise
   *
   * @param array $cfg

getHaving.name: getHaving
getHaving.summary: Returns a string with the HAVING part of the query if there is, empty otherwise

doc.description: Returns a string with the HAVING part of the query if there is, empty otherwise

getHaving.comments:

   * Returns a string with the HAVING part of the query if there is, empty otherwise
   *
   * @param array $cfg

getOrder.name: getOrder
getOrder.summary: Get a string starting with ORDER BY with corresponding parameters to $order.
getOrder.comments:
/**
   * Get a string starting with ORDER BY with corresponding parameters to $order.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getOrder(['name' => 'DESC' ],'table_users'));
   * // (string) ORDER BY `name` DESC
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getLimit.name: getLimit
getLimit.summary: Get a string starting with LIMIT with corresponding parameters to $limit.
getLimit.comments:
/**
   * Get a string starting with LIMIT with corresponding parameters to $limit.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getLimit(['limit' => 3, 'start'  => 1]));
   * // (string) LIMIT 1, 3
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

getCreate.name: getCreate
getCreate.summary: Return SQL code for table creation.

doc.description:
Return SQL code for table creation.

```php
X::dump($db->getCreate("table_users"));
/*
(string)
   CREATE TABLE `table_users` (
     `userid` int(11) NOT NULL,
     `userdataid` int(11) NOT NULL,
     `info` char(200) DEFAULT NULL,
      PRIMARY KEY (`userid`,`userdataid`),
      KEY `table_users_userId_userdataId_info` (`userid`,`userdataid`,`info`)
   ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

```

getCreate.comments:
/**
   * Return SQL code for table creation.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getCreate("table_users"));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *    CREATE TABLE `table_users` (
   *      `userid` int(11) NOT NULL,
   *      `userdataid` int(11) NOT NULL,
   *      `info` char(200) DEFAULT NULL,
   *       PRIMARY KEY (`userid`,`userdataid`),
   *       KEY `table_users_userId_userdataId_info` (`userid`,`userdataid`,`info`)
   *    ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
   *
   * ```
   * 
   * @param string $table The table's name
   * @return string | false
   * @throws Exception
   */

createIndex.summary: Creates an index on one or more column(s) of the table

createIndex.comments:
/**
   * Creates an index on one or more column(s) of the table
   *
   * @param string $table
   * @param string|array $column
   * @param bool $unique
   * @param null|int $length
   * @return bool
   * @throws Exception
   * @todo return data
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->createIndex('table_users','id_group'));
   * // (bool) true
   * ```
   *
   */

getUsers.name: getUsers
getUsers.summary: Return an array including privileges of a specific db_user or all db_users.

arguments.name: user
arguments.description: . The user's name, without params will return all privileges of all db_users

doc.description: Return an array including privileges of a specific db_user or all db_users.

params.name: $user
params.description: . The user's name, without params will return all privileges of all db_users

getUsers.comments:
/**
   * Return an array including privileges of a specific db_user or all db_users.
   * @param string $user . The user's name, without params will return all privileges of all db_users
   * @param string $host . The host
   * @return array
   * @throws Exception
   * @todo far vedere  a th la descrizione
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getUsers('Michael'));
   * /* (array) [
   *      "GRANT USAGE ON *.* TO 'Michael'@''",
   *       GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, DROP, INDEX, ALTER ON `db_example`.* TO 'Michael'@''"
   *    ]
   * ```
   *
   */

dummyComments:
/**
   * Actions to do once the PDO object has been created
   *
   * ```php
   * X::hdump($ctrl->db->postCreation()); // null 
   * ```
   * 
   * @return void
   */

/**
   * Changes the database used to the given one.
   *
   * ```php
   * $db = new Db();
   * X::dump($db->change('db_example'));
   * // (db)
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $db The database's name
   * @return self
   */

/**
   * Escapes names with the appropriate quotes (db, tables, columns, keys...)
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->escape("table_users"));
   * // (string) `table_users`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $item The name to escape.
   * @return string
   */

/**
   * Return table's full name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->tableFullName("table_users"));
   * // (String) db_example.table_users
   * X::dump($db->tableFullName("table_users", true));
   * // (String) `db_example`.`table_users`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table   The table's name (escaped or not).
   * @param bool   $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped.
   * @return string | false
   */

/**
   * Returns true if the given string is the full name of a table ('database.table').
   *
   * ```php
   * X::hdump($ctrl->db->isTableFullName("table_users")); // true or false
   * ```
   * 
   * @param string $table The table's name
   * @return bool
   */

/**
   * Returns true if the given string is the full name of a column ('table.column').
   *
   * ```php
   * X::hdump($ctrl->db->isColFullName("column_users")); // true or false
   * ```
   * 
   * @param string $col
   * @return bool
   */

/**
   * Return table's simple name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->tableSimpleName("example_db.table_users"));
   * // (string) table_users
   * X::dump($db->tableSimpleName("example.table_users", true));
   * // (string) `table_users`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table   The table's name (escaped or not)
   * @param bool   $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped
   * @return string | false
   */

/**
   * Return column's full name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->colFullName("name", "table_users"));
   * // (string)  table_users.name Hello Ohohoho!!
   * X::dump($db->colFullName("name", "table_users", true));
   * // (string) \`table_users\`.\`name\`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $col The column's name (escaped or not)
   * @param string|null $table The table's name (escaped or not)
   * @param bool $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped
   * @return string | false
   */

/**
   * Return the column's simple name.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->colSimpleName("table_users.name"));
   * // (string) name
   * X::dump($db->colSimpleName("table_users.name", true));
   * // (string) `name`
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $col     The column's complete name (escaped or not).
   * @param bool   $escaped If set to true the returned string will be escaped.
   * @return string | false
   */

/**
   * Disables foreign keys constraints.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->disableKeys());
   * // (self)
   * ```
   *
   * @return self
   */

/**
   * Enables foreign keys constraints.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->enableKeys());
   * // (db)
   * ```
   *
   * @return self
   */

/**
   * Return databases' names as an array.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getDatabases());
   * /*
   * (array)[
   *      "db_customers",
   *      "db_clients",
   *      "db_empty",
   *      "db_example",
   *      "db_mail"
   *      ]
   * ```
   * @return null|array
   */

/**
   * Return tables' names of a database as an array.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getTables('db_example'));
   * /*
   * (array) [
   *        "clients",
   *        "columns",
   *        "cron",
   *        "journal",
   *        "dbs",
   *        "examples",
   *        "history",
   *        "hosts",
   *        "keys",
   *        "mails",
   *        "medias",
   *        "notes",
   *        "medias",
   *        "versions"
   *        ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $database Database name
   * @return null|array
   */

/**
   * Return columns' structure of a table as an array indexed with the fields names.
   *
   * * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getColumns('table_users'));
   * /* (array)[
   *            "id" => [
   *              "position" => 1,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => "PRI",
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "auto_increment",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "8",
   *              "type" => "int",
   *            ],
   *           "name" => [
   *              "position" => 2,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => null,
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "30",
   *              "type" => "varchar",
   *            ],
   *            "surname" => [
   *              "position" => 3,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => null,
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "30",
   *              "type" => "varchar",
   *            ],
   *            "address" => [
   *              "position" => 4,
   *              "null" => 0,
   *              "key" => "UNI",
   *              "default" => null,
   *              "extra" => "",
   *              "signed" => 0,
   *              "maxlength" => "30",
   *              "type" => "varchar",
   *            ],
   *          ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table The table's name
   * @return null|array
   */

/**
   * Return the table's keys as an array indexed with the fields names.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getKeys("table_users"));
   * /*
   * (array)[
   *      "keys" => [
   *        "PRIMARY" => [
   *          "columns" => [
   *            "id",
   *          ],
   *          "ref_db" => null,
   *          "ref_table" => null,
   *          "ref_column" => null,
   *          "unique" => 1,
   *        ],
   *        "number" => [
   *          "columns" => [
   *            "number",
   *          ],
   *          "ref_db" => null,
   *          "ref_table" => null,
   *          "ref_column" => null,
   *         "unique" => 1,
   *        ],
   *      ],
   *      "cols" => [
   *        "id" => [
   *          "PRIMARY",
   *        ],
   *        "number" => [
   *          "number",
   *        ],
   *      ],
   * ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $table The table's name
   * @return null|array
   */

/**
   * Returns a string with the conditions for any filter clause.
   *
   * @param array $conditions
   * @param array $cfg
   * @param bool $is_having
   * @param int $indent
   * @return string
   */

/**
   * Return SQL code for row(s) SELECT.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getSelect(['tables' => ['users'],'fields' => ['id', 'name']]));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *   SELECT
   *    `table_users`.`name`,
   *    `table_users`.`surname`
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Returns the SQL code for an INSERT statement.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getInsert([
   *   'tables' => ['table_users'],
   *   'fields' => ['name','surname']
   * ]));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *  INSERT INTO `db_example`.`table_users` (
   *              `name`, `surname`)
   *              VALUES (?, ?)
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Returns the SQL code for an UPDATE statement.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getUpdate([
   *   'tables' => ['table_users'],
   *   'fields' => ['name','surname']
   * ]));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *    UPDATE `db_example`.`table_users`
   *    SET `table_users`.`name` = ?,
   *        `table_users`.`surname` = ?
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Returns the SQL code for a DELETE statement.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getDelete(['tables' => ['table_users']]));
   * // (string) DELETE FROM `db_example`.`table_users` * WHERE 1 AND `table_users`.`id` = ?
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg The configuration array
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Returns a string with the JOIN part of the query if there is, empty otherwise
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Return a string with 'where' conditions.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getWhere(['id' => 9], 'table_users'));
   * // (string) WHERE 1 AND `table_users`.`id` = ?
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Returns a string with the GROUP BY part of the query if there is, empty otherwise
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Returns a string with the HAVING part of the query if there is, empty otherwise
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Get a string starting with ORDER BY with corresponding parameters to $order.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getOrder(['name' => 'DESC' ],'table_users'));
   * // (string) ORDER BY `name` DESC
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Get a string starting with LIMIT with corresponding parameters to $limit.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getLimit(['limit' => 3, 'start'  => 1]));
   * // (string) LIMIT 1, 3
   * ```
   *
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return string
   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
   * Return SQL code for table creation.
   *
   * ```php
   * X::dump($db->getCreate("table_users"));
   * /*
   * (string)
   *    CREATE TABLE `table_users` (
   *      `userid` int(11) NOT NULL,
   *      `userdataid` int(11) NOT NULL,
   *      `info` char(200) DEFAULT NULL,
   *       PRIMARY KEY (`userid`,`userdataid`),
   *       KEY `table_users_userId_userdataId_info` (`userid`,`userdataid`,`info`)
   *    ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
   *
   * ```
   * 
   * @param string $table The table's name

   * @throws Exception
   */

/**
